amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide for a one percent across the board cut to the bill's spending levels. Accounts for the Capitol Police, Architect of the Capitol-Capitol Police Buildings, Grounds and Security, and Office of the Sergeant At Arms shall not be reduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 237 (Roll no. 290).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 237 (Roll no. 290).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
